data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,177 believers in Melilla that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Melilla
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Melilla to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Melilla.

data.section_summary:
the county of Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain has a population of 73,500.

We estimate Melilla has 1,177 people who might know Jesus, 55,646 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 16,677 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Melilla, Ceuta y Melilla, Spain into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
